messages.content: The referendum result was bad enough. But with this Government taking the result as an instruction to push the most damaging hard Brexit, it feels even worse. This isn’t what I want for my children or my country. Isolation isn’t good for Britain. Being outside the single market isn’t good for Britain. Ignoring the damage that hard Brexit does to jobs, food prices and industry isn’t good for Britain. This election is our chance to get the strong opposition Britain needs.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fight to stop a hard Brexit and ensure the people, not Theresa May, have the final say on the Brexit deal.
Stop more harsh cuts to our NHS.
Prevent heartless cuts to benefits for bereaved families.

issues.brexitEurope: Stop a hard Brexit. The referendum result as an instruction to push the most damaging hard Brexit. Outside the single market isn't good for Britain.
issues.health: Stop more harsh cuts to our NHS.
issues.socialWelfare: Stop heartless cuts to benefits for bereaved families.

leaflet.personalStatement: This isn’t what I want for my children or my country. Isolation isn’t good for Britain.

quotes.text: This election is our chance to get the strong opposition Britain needs.

images.caption: Tim Farron - CHANGE THE DIRECTION OF THE COUNTRY

leaflet.additionalNotes: PS I'd love to hear your views on Brexit and other issues. Please do complete the enclosed survey.
